name: 3 Tiles - Animal Mahjong Match
description:
Tile Master - Triple Mahjong Blocks Matching

We've created the best addictive classic game ever for you! Combination of legendary games: Mahjong+, Pikachu, tile master, different matching games, tile craft, best mahjong games (even mahjong solitaire), and some popular tile games. Tile Master was created with a desire to provide a new experience based on the classic board game.

In this matching tile game, you need to connect 3 numbers of blocks with vivid animal pictures. Match triple items of the same type to pass the current level! Our puzzle game includes large numbers of levels for you to challenge in your free time.

How to play Tile Master - Triple Mahjong Blocks Matching?

Some connect puzzle levels can be tricky. The only thing you need to do is match blocks with pictures, however you will need to be careful not to exceed the number of tiles specified in the box below.

1. Choose three same blocks of identical pet pictures! Match triple tiles to put them into the stack. Three similar tiles will be matched and removed from your tile stack.

2. When the playing field is cleared, you win! Continue your tile match practice to become a real match master one day!

- If you don't get at least one merge and your stack becomes full, you lose. You need to pay attention to the maximum number of stacks to be able to pass the stage easily. Each match block matters!


Matching Mahjong Tile's features:

- Adorable animal images with up to hundreds of different blocks.
- Each level is a different block arrangement to challenge you.
- Useful tips, undo, and powerful boosters!
- Effect when crush mahjong tile is interesting.

You can play ONLINE/OFFLINE at any time, anywhere either Phone or tablet!

Let's Crush the Mahjong Tiles with us!!
